title: Making League of Legends run better!
body:
Hi I currently run league of legends at around 60 fps and 35fps (sometimes lower) in team fights... I am not sure what I need to do to improve this. I built my computer about 4-5 years ago and am 100% willing to buy new parts to improve my in game experience. I currently run an AMD FX-8320 Eight core processor 8gb of ram 64bit os and a Geforce GT 610 graphics card. Ive updated all drivers. My cpu usage sit around 8% while playing league with no applications open. (I want to be able to record with no lag)  I have taken various steps to help improve my ingame fps but I am still sitting at a low fps while im not even recording. A possibly important note could be that I am currently on Windows 7 but I did a hard drive wipe and lost my genuine copy of windows 7 and am now on a non genuine product key for windows 7. But before I still had the issues so Im not sure if that is effecting anything! Please if you have any idea of what will optimize my in game experience (even if I need to spend some money) please do let me know!
Links
Processor - https://pcpartpicker.com/product/dmw323/amd-cpu-fd8320frhkbox
Graphics card - https://www.geforce.com/hardware/desktop-gpus/geforce-gt-610/specifications

replies.body: I'd say those specs should be running League relatively well imho. If that's not showing any improvement, hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they might be able to figure something out with you!
